data.comment: The match is underway in San Luis de Potosi.
San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Cruz Azul.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 8, In San Luis de Potosi Cruz Azul attack through Orbelin Pineda. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 9, San Luis to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 12, Cruz Azul drive forward but Santiago Gimenez is judged offside.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Mauro Quiroga of San Luis is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a San Luis throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
San Luis's Nicolas Ibanez misses with an attempt on goal.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 22, Cruz Azul have been given a penalty...
It's advantage Cruz Azul in San Luis de Potosi as Jonathan Rodriguez scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 24, San Luis's Luis Leon breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Luis's German Berterame gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 27, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Cruz Azul.
Roberto Alvarado (Cruz Azul) has received a yellow card from Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to San Luis.
Penalty! Oscar Mejia Garcia points to the spot, great chance for San Luis...
In the minute 31, San Luis are awarded a penalty ... Nicolas Ibanez botches the spot kick!
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, San Luis have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Cruz Azul.
German Berterame for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 36, Throw-in San Luis.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jonathan Rodriguez scores with a header and the away team increase their lead to 0-2.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 41, Igor Lichnovsky (Cruz Azul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Important block from the Cruz Azul defence as Nicolas Ibanez fires in a strike for San Luis.
In the minute 43, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Goal! Nicolas Ibanez pulls one back to make it 1-2.
The second-half is now underway.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 47, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards San Luis a goal kick.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul's Santiago Gimenez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Juan Escobar (Cruz Azul) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 50, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in San Luis's half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 52, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul's Juan Escobar gets in a shot but it is blocked by a San Luis defender.
Cruz Azul are pushing forward but Rafael Baca's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards San Luis a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a San Luis throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 58, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In San Luis de Potosi, Mauro Quiroga (San Luis) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Throw-in San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
In the minute 63, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 69, Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in San Luis's half.
The home team replace Luis Leon with Diego Pineda.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Nicolas Ibanez (San Luis) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Anderson Julio is replacing German Berterame for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Juan Escobar for Cruz Azul is whistled offside.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 77, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robert Siboldi is making the team's first substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Ignacio Rivero replacing Roberto Alvarado.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, San Luis to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 83, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Robert Siboldi (Cruz Azul) is making a second substitution, with Yoshimar Yotun replacing Jonathan Rodriguez.
In the minute 85, Juan Castro is on a sub for Pablo Barrera for San Luis.
Goal! Santiago Gimenez extends Cruz Azul's lead to 1-3.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 89, Yoshimar Yotun (Cruz Azul) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
San Luis have been awarded a penalty...
A massive blow for San Luis as Anderson Julio misses from the spot.
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
